title: Software Engineer - JDK
summary: We are looking for an experienced and motivated Software Engineer to join the Apple Services Engineering team! We build and seamlessly integrate technologies that enrich people’s lives. You will join a diverse team of people who are passionate about developing new technologies and services for our customers. You will be collaborating with many different teams within Apple to further improve the quality of our products
description: Join Apple's JDK team as a Production Engineer. You will be key to establishing and implementing the best of Apple enterprise technologies within the broader Apple engineering ecosystem. Partnering with teams using Apple cloud technologies for improving Apple products as well as identifying areas for opportunity and adding your input to process improvements and the creation of new technologies. This position is responsible for working closely with various Engineering teams to develop, implement, execute, analyze, and communicate the features and enhancements critical to deliver the next cloud services and cloud products for Apple.
key_qualifications:
Proven track record coding in compiled languages such as C++ and Java
Experience with Java Virtual Machine internals
Proven experience building, maintaining, and debugging production services/platforms such as cloud infrastructure, load balancers, relational databases, orchestration and messaging systems.
Demonstrated ability with software development, frameworks and APIs.
preferred_qualifications:
Experience with containers and container orchestration (Rancher, Kubernetes, Docker, Meso)
Experience working in an open source community
